title: The Grassy Knoll
body: What really happened on that fateful day in Dallas? Some say there was another shooter on that hill.

title: How many shooters were there?
body: Some say there was more than one shooter on that day in Dallas. What do you think?

title: Lee Harvey Oswald and the CIA
body: Was Lee Harvey Oswald a patsy? Some say he was a CIA agent

title: Jack Ruby and the Mob
body: Why did a nightclub owner assasinate an assasin? Some say he was working for the mob.

title: The LBJ Connection
body: What did Lyndon B. Johnson know about the JFK assassination? Some say he was involved.

title: The Roswell Incident
body: Was it a weather balloon or something more? Some say the government is hiding the truth from us.

title: Area 51: Fact or Fiction?
body: What really goes on at this top-secret military base? Some say it's a testing ground for alien technology.

title: Aliens in the Media
body: Are aliens being used to distract us from the real issues? Some say the government is using them as a cover-up

title: Ancient Aliens
body: Did extraterrestrials visit Earth in the distant past? Some say they helped shape our history and buildings.

title: UFOs in the Bible
body: Are there references to UFOs in the Bible? Some say the chariots of fire were actually alien spacecraft.

title: What happened to Madeleine McCann?
body: The 3-year-old disappeared from her hotel room in Portugal in 2007. Some say her parents were involved.

title: The Dyatlov Pass incident
body: What really happened to the hikers in the Ural Mountains in 1959? Some say it was an avalanche, others say it was something more sinister.

title: The Yuba County Five
body: What happened in the cabin to these five young men?

title: Jack the Ripper: The Royal Conspiracy
body: Was the infamous serial killer actually a member of the royal family? Some say he was protected by the crown.

title: What happened to the crew of the Mary Celeste?
body: The ship was found adrift in the Atlantic Ocean in 1872 with no sign of the crew. Some say they were abducted by aliens.

title: The differerent rites of Freemasonry
body: Some say there are different rites of Freemasonry, each with its own secrets and rituals.

title: Founding Fathers and Freemasonry
body: Some say the founding fathers of the United States were Freemasons who used their influence to shape the country's future.

title: Freemasons and the Illuminati
body: Freemasons have covertly opposed the Illuminati for centuries. Some say they are still fighting to this day.

title: Prince Hall Freemasonry
body: Some say Prince Hall Freemasonry is a separate and distinct organization from traditional Freemasonry.

title: The Knights Templar and Freemasonry
body: Some say the Knights Templar were the original Freemasons, and their secrets have been passed down through the ages.

title: MK Ultra and the UNABOMBER
body: Was Ted Kaczynski a victim of the CIA's mind control experiments? Some say he was a patsy.

title: The CIA and Mind Control
body: MK Ultra was just the tip of the iceberg. Some say the CIA is still experimenting with mind control techniques.

title: Psychic Spies
body: Some say the CIA used psychics to gather intelligence during the Cold War.

title: Psychedelic Drugs and the CIA
body: Some say the CIA used LSD and other drugs to control and manipulate people's minds.

title: Who signed off on MK Ultra?
body: Did the President know about the CIA's mind control experiments?

title: Bigfoot: Fact or Fiction?
body: Was he a missing link or a hoax? Some say he's still out there in the woods.

title: The Loch Ness Monster
body: Is there a prehistoric creature living in the depths of Loch Ness? Some say it's just a legend.

title: Mothman
body: Some say the Mothman is a harbinger of doom, appearing before disasters strike.

title: The Nephilim
body: Were the Nephilim the offspring of angels and humans? Some say they were giants who once roamed the Earth.

title: Dragons Across the World
body: Are dragons just a myth or did they once exist? Every culture has their stories.

title: Stanley Kubrick and the Moon Landing
body: Did the famous director help fake the moon landing? Some say he left clues in his films.

title: The Eternal Wave
body: If there is no wind, why does the flag wave on the moon?

title: Neil Armstrong's Missing Flag
body: Why is there no flag in the photo of Neil Armstrong on the moon? Some say it was left out on purpose.

title: How did they get there?
body: What is a rocket? Does anyone really believe that we went to the moon?

title: The Van Allen Belt
body: How did the astronauts survive the radiation in the Van Allen Belt? Some say it's impossible.

title: The Fruit of the Loom Logo
body: The logo of Fruit of the Loom is a cornucopia. Or is it?

title: Did Nelson Mandela die in prison?
body: Some people remember it that way. Some say it's a false memory.

title: Pika Pika
body: Has Pikachu's tail always had a black tip? Some say it used to be all yellow.

title: The Berenstain Bears
body: Some people remember it as the Berenstein Bears. Some say it's a parallel universe.

title: The Mandela Effect and the Simulation Theory
body: Some say the Mandela Effect is proof that we are living in a simulated reality.

title: The HMS Atlanta
body: The first of many disappearances in the Bermuda Triangle. Some say it was a time warp.

title: Flight 19
body: The five planes that disappeared in the Bermuda Triangle. Some say they were abducted by aliens.

title: Time Travel in the Bermuda Triangle
body: Some say the Bermuda Triangle is a portal to another dimension.

title: Compass Malfunctions and Magnetic Anomalies
body: Is the Bermuda Triangle is a hotbed of magnetic activity that causes compasses to go haywire?

title: The Bermuda Triangle and the Lost City of Atlantis
body: Where is the site of the lost city of Atlantis? Could it be near these equatorial waters?

title: El Dorado
body: The lost city of gold. It's hidden in the Amazon rainforest.

title: Camelot: Fact or Fiction?
body: Was King Arthur a real person? Some say he was a myth created to unite the British people.

title: Atlantis and the Human Subconscious
body: A city lost to time and the waves. Are we drawn to it because it represents our own subconscious?

title: Atlantis and the Human Subconscious
body: A city lost to time and the waves. Are we drawn to it because it represents our own subconscious?

title: The Lost City of Z
body: A legendary city that sparked the scramble for the Americas.

title: Sodom and Gomorrah
body: The cities of sin. Were they destroyed by a vengeful god? Some say it was a natural disaster.
